editorialNotes.standard: Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercellâs awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package thatâs easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, thereâs no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

editorialNotes.standard: This twist on the iconic board game lets you build landmarks, wreck rivalsâ property, and rake in profits.

If youâve ever dreamed of ruling your own fantasy world populated with scaly serpents and other mythical beasties, Dragon City is a treasure trove. Itâs delightfully satisfying to breed, hatch, and raise dragons with an array of elemental abilities, and then enter them in PokÃ©mon-style battles against friends or exciting league tournaments. If youâre a more peaceful dragon-lord in search of relaxation, simply clear land, build habitats, and develop enough farms to feed your ever-growing population of wily wyverns.
